text: Irrikku M.D. Akathudu is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P. G. Vishwambharan and produced by V. M. Basheer. The film stars Innocent, Mukesh, A. C. Zainuddin and Sunitha in the lead roles. The film has musical score by Shyam. ==Cast== *Mukesh as Jayan *Siddique as Sunny *Saikumar as Suresh *Sunitha as Ancy Sreedharan *Jagadish as Johnson *A. C. Zainuddin as Abdul Nazer *Geetha Vijayan as Manju Samuel *Chithra as Sujatha *Kalabhavan Ansar *Innocent as Samuel *Alummodan *Thodupuzha Vasanthi as suresh mother *Rizabawa as S. Sreekumar *K.P.A.C. Sunny as Sukumaran Nair ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by Shyam and the lyrics were written by Pradeep Ashtamichira, Ranjith Mattanchery and R. K. Damodaran. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! No. !! Song !! Singers !! Lyrics !! Length (m:ss) |- | 1 || "Aaromale Nee En" || M. G. Sreekumar || Pradeep Ashtamichira, Ranjith Mattanchery, R. K. Damodaran || |- | 2 || "Kodiyuduthetho" || M. G. Sreekumar, Sujatha Mohan, Chorus || Pradeep Ashtamichira, Ranjith Mattanchery, R. K. Damodaran || |- | 3 || "Ningalkkoru Joli" || M. G. Sreekumar, Chorus || Pradeep Ashtamichira, Ranjith Mattanchery, R. K.
